mapper.select: select user_id, account, password, sex, id_card, name, department_id, area_code, birthday, stauts, last_login_time, mobile, email, seat, user_level, create_time from users where user_id=#{userId}

select t.user_id, t.account, t.password, t.sex, t.id_card, t.name, t.department_id, a.area_code, birthday, t.stauts, t.last_login_time, t.mobile, t.email, t.seat, t.user_level, t.create_time, a.parent_department_id parentCorpId,a.department_name corpName, t.cur_syid from users t left join department a on t.department_id=a.department_id where t.account=#{account}
select department_id, parent_department_id, department_name, create_time, create_user_id, status from department where department_id=#{departmentId}

select t.resources_id, t.parent_resources_id, t.resources_name, (CASE WHEN t.resources_type = 2 THEN CONCAT(t.resources_url, '?id=', t.resources_id) ELSE t.resources_url END) resources_url, t.resources_path,
ifnull(t.remark,'fa fa-cog') resources_icon,
t.resources_icon,
t.resources_type, t.create_time, t.create_user_id, t.remark, t.syid, (select count(*) from resources where parent_resources_id=t.resources_id) child_count from resources t where t.resources_id in (select t.resources_id from role_resources t where t.role_id in (select t.role_id from users_role t where t.user_id = #{userId})) order by t.SEQUENCE,t.RESOURCES_ID

SELECT t.code ID, t.parent_code PID, t.name TEXT, '' SRC, '' HREF, '' ICON, 'closed' STATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM province WHERE province.parent_code = t.code) CHILD_COUNT FROM province t where 0=0 ORDER BY t.code

select t.code ID, t.parent_code PID, t.name TEXT, 'closed' STATE, '' SRC, '' ICON, '' HREF, (select count(*) from province where province.parent_code = t.code) CHILD_COUNT from province t where (t.code=#{pid} or t.parent_code=#{pid}) order by t.code
select concat('ROLE_',t.role_id) ROLE,role_id id from users_role t where t.user_id = #{userId}
select TYPE from role where role_id in(select T.role_id ROLE from users_role t where t.user_id = #{userId})

select t.department_id CODE, t.department_name NAME, a.name AREANAME from DEPARTMENT t left join province a on t.parent_department_id = a.code where 0=0
and (t.department_id=#{params.q} or t.department_name like concat('%',#{params.q},'%'))
order by t.department_name limit 0,20

select t.USER_ID, t.NAME, t.SEX, t.ID_CARD, a.DEPARTMENT_NAME, t.MOBILE from users t left join department a on t.department_id = a.department_id where 0=0
and t.department_id=#{params.departmentId}
and (t.user_id=#{params.q} or t.name like concat('%',#{params.q},'%'))
order by t.create_time limit 0,20

select user_id, account, password, sex, id_card, name, department_id, area_code, birthday, stauts, last_login_time, mobile, email, seat, user_level, create_time from users where email=#{email} limit 0,1

SELECT t.department_id ID, t.parent_department_id PID, t.department_name TEXT, '' SRC, '' HREF, '' ICON, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM department WHERE department.parent_department_id = t.department_id and department.status='1') CHILD_COUNT FROM department t where t.status='1' and (t.department_id =#{pid} or t.parent_department_id=#{pid})
ORDER BY t.department_id
select config_key, category, config_name, config_value from config where (syid='sys' or syid=#{syid})

select ifnull(syid,'sys') syid from resources t where t.resources_id in (select t.resources_id from role_resources t where t.role_id in (select t.role_id from users_role t where t.user_id = #{userId})) and syid!='sys' group by syid
